entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VisualElement.HeightRequest defaults to 0 instead of -1 when using OnIdom default value #9978
  • Errors in try/catch kill the application when there is no internet #9977
  • Fix Visual Test Runner so that it will split up tests that use class based test cases #9976
    Backlog
  • Simplify and make more robust the process for Single-instance WinUI apps #9973
    Backlog
  • Connectivity implementation not thread-safe on Windows, returning incorrect network status #9972
    Backlog
  • Image "AspectFit" not centered #9971
    Backlog
  • [MAC] Horizontal Options of child inside absolute layout is not working with "RightToLeft' flow direction #9970
    Backlog
  • Image wrong rotation with a ContentView and BindableProperty #9969
    Backlog
  • Collectionview selectedItemChanged event causes framework error on android #9964
  • PersistentComponentState in Maui Blazor #9957

Closed

  • SetEnvironmentVariable for GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS works on windows but give error on android #9963
  • iOS binding library project template #3688
  • HideKeyboard #3850
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Fail to install MAUI with error "Workload installation failed: microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm::6.0.9 is not found in NuGet feeds" #9934
  • dotnet publish not working with dependent projects #9879
  • Youtube player is tiny in MAUI Android Webview #9884
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • Specific website not scrollable in WebView, probably cookie popup issue #9890
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • [iOS] MyRecipes and RecipeSearch collections have fixed dimensions #4124
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Centered StackLayout within StackLayout does not center #9927
    Backlog
  • System.NullReferenceException in ShellToolbarTracker.cs:581 when opening the app via notification tray #9090
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor .NET MUAI] Not all CSS cursor properties are functional #9960
  • CollectionView: ScrollTo does not work [Windows11, Android11/12, iOS not tested] dotnet --version: 6.0.400 #9920
  • VoiceOver is reading invisible control. #8754
    7.0-rc1
  • Voiceover reading button for "Click here to View full recipe" link. #5816
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Data Binding not working #9932
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.0 #9966
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1293.44 to 1.0.1343.22 #9965
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix crash scrolling Shell Flyout list (CollapseOnScroll) #9962
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Merged

  • [Android] Fix crash using a Name in a GradientStop #9865
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, high
  • [Android] Fix crash opening Shell app via notification tray #9933
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, high
  • Correctly layout the WebView #9923
    .NET 6 + Servicing
  • Try fix API docs #9757
    area/docs 📓
  • Don't Propagate Command Mappers when Android View is Disposed of #9956
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix root page swapping #9955
    7.0-rc2
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending Core xml comments #9950
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix wrong Slider ThumbImage size #8760
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (not before) #9678
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecesary parent) #9840
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, high
  • [Windows] Rename W2DImage to PlatformImage #9948
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Core] Fix ImageButton IsLoading property #9917
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [net6.0][Core]Fixes wrong declared CommandMapper types #9930
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, .NET 6 + Servicing
